channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Twitter Feed
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Twitter Feed

item.title: CVE-2021-24413|2024-08-03T19:28:23.838Z -- unknown -- easy%20twitter%20feed
item.description: The Easy Twitter Feed WordPress plugin before 1.2 does not sanitise or validate the parameters from its shortcode, allowing users with a role as low as contributor to set Cross-Site Scripting payload in them which will be triggered in the page/s with the embed malicious shortcode
